verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm free indeed
In Christ I'm free indeed
No chains are holding me
It's who I choose to be

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I choose to be free
I choose to be free
I choose to be free
I choose to be free

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I'm free indeed
In Christ I'm free indeed
Was blind but now I see
It's who I'm meant to be
